data.title: Absolutely amazing food and experience
data.text:
This was the best meal we have had in a while. Absolutely amazing. We have never had Shabu before, our server was so attentive and nice and the food was delicious. The experience itself was great, you get to cook your own meal. We had lemon sake which was the best sake we have had ever. Sever recommended the prime beef which we both went for and it was great. 2 plates, 1 with 9 pieces of meat and 1 with 12 and a small bottle of sake, the bill came to $62 before tip which I find extremely reasonable. We also had a small bottle of sake on the house which was appreciated. we both left more than full, that is quite a lot of food! 
We will definitely be back next time we are in Huntington!

data.title: Sushi Fun
data.text: Sushi On Fire is a great way to try sushi without the traditional stuffiness. This place is all about great food and good fun

data.title: Sushi in Downtown HB
data.text: Shabu and Sushi on Fire are the best spots for sushi. Same owner and only a few stores away from each other. So even at dinner time you can get a seat right away at one of these spots. Sushi rolls are affordable and big. Service is great and fast.

data.title: Great sushi
data.text: Same owner as sushi on fire, so you can get the same great sushi here. Hercules roll is my favorite, but everything I've tried is amazing. Don't even need soy sauce or wasabi since the sauces are perfectly tailored to the rolls.

data.title: Great alternative to Sushi on Fire
data.text: We came here when we had a wait at Sushi on Fire. Sister location, Shabu plus the regular menu. Smaller location, seating at bar like counters.

data.title: Awesome Sushi
data.text: Went to the sister restaurant next door, Sushi on Fire, long wait, went next door to Shabu on Fire, seated right away.  Great Sushi here and very reasonable prices.  Want to try the Shabu next time.  Highly recommend this place.

data.title: Add some fun to your dining experience
data.text: We had dinner at Shabu and it was a really fun experience. There was a station at each seat that had a hot plate where your chosen bowl of broth heated up and you stewed your meat and vegetables in the broth.  A couple of sauces and a bowl for the food when it was cooked.  It was interactive and fun.  If you don't want that option there is other things on the menu, but everyone in our party did the Shabu and loved it!

data.title: Ah Shabu, Service,Atmosphere, The meals, Always  the best
data.text: IWe were there for lunch and it can get hectic...They are grace under pressure. The service never suffered. We had Hot tea and spring rolls within minutes and the taste Of course EXCELLENT! My all time favourite place in the HB

data.title: ON FIRE
data.text: Our family lives in Huntington Beach aka Surf City,USA.  We love the elegance of Shabu on Fire.  Excellent service.

data.title: We had a great evening
data.text: We had an excellent evening out.  The staff helped us put together some great choices.  They suggested drinking the broth at the end and the flavors were wonderful.

data.title: Delicious sushi
data.text:
We go with big eaters and get the sushi boat.
It's a great selection of rolls and sashimi, tempura and comes with soup

data.title: Mouth Organism
data.text: The flavors are amazing with all the fresh veggies. I love that you can turn it into a soup so that you dont have to waste any bit of it.

data.title: Awesome
data.text: We went to sushi on fire but it was packed, the owner suggested shabu on fire (I guess their related) the staff were very friendly, accommodating, efficient and the food was very good. Recommend a visit

data.title: SUSHI ON FIRE.....THE REAL DEAL
data.text: Whenever I have guests come to visit and they want Sushi, the only place I will take them to is SUSHI ON FIRE.  If you are a local you know that Mama is usually there shouting orders and getting guests seated as quickly as possible.  If she's in a good mood, you might get a "saki on the house"!  In any case, it is more than safe to bring those discriminating sushi eaters here, they have it all and they know how to make it right.  The Miso is amazing and my favorite it the big dish of chicken fried rice...mmmmm

data.title: Great food in a  great location
data.text:
This is a new place on Main Street in Huntington Beach.  Atmosphere is nice, clean restaurant and staff is super friendly.  We go for the shabby shabby which is always fresh and presentation is wonderful.  Plenty of food, and sometimes there is enough to take home.  

The spicy edame appetizer is amazing - must order!  It's a spicy sweet yummy goodness and not to miss
Request the pork base for the soup, add the onions, garlic that they bring out before the veggies.  The serving of meat is pretty generous and they bring a large plate of fresh veggies.  Brown rice is served upon request. 

They also serve sushi which has always been fresh and tasty.  They also own Sushi on Fire a few doors down which is always crowded.  Go early if you want to avoid the wait.

data.title: Good food, Good service.
data.text: Same people that own Sushi on fire, own this place so it's very similar, I like it when it isn't crowded.

data.title: This is #1's little sister
data.text: This is Sushi On Fire's little sister. Same owner and same menu except the cook in front of you part. If SOF is full and long line, you can go here and get same great rolls.

data.title: Asian fare with a twist
data.text: Variety, quality, and service above the ordinary Asian restaurant. Their menu includes delicious low-carb options.

data.title: Excelent
data.text:
We went on Lunch time, wasnt busy, so the service was perfect!!
The food was realy good! I recomend it for sure!!
Nancy, the manager gave us a good atention and prepared us a woldeful meal!!
Great!!

data.title: Excellent Food!!! Great Atmosphere!!!
data.text: Excellent food and a fun and energetic atmosphere made the experience an enjoyable one. Would have given 5 stars but our server was a bit inattentive and only smiled at check time. The food was definitely 5 stars however with some of the freshest sashimi I've ever had! Will definitely return!!!
